meta.description: Determine the company's production plan to maximize profit for manufacturing three types of tabletop golf toys.

params.name: labor_hours
params.description: Labor hours required per unit for each toy type.

params.name: inspection_hours
params.description: Inspection hours required per unit for each toy type.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit for each toy type.

params.name: max_demand
params.description: Maximum demand for each toy type.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units to produce for each toy type.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from producing the toys.

constraints.name: labor_hours_constraint
constraints.description: Total labor hours used cannot exceed available labor hours.

constraints.name: inspection_hours_constraint
constraints.description: Total inspection hours used cannot exceed available inspection hours.

constraints.name: demand_constraint_advanced
constraints.description: Production of advanced type cannot exceed its demand.

constraints.name: demand_constraint_intermediate
constraints.description: Production of intermediate type cannot exceed its demand.

constraints.name: demand_constraint_basic
constraints.description: Production of basic type cannot exceed its demand.
